case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: Remains were recovered in a remote desert, an area common for border crossing. Personal effects were found with the remains, please see "Clothing and Accessories" page for more information. These include 2 tickets- 1 for a ferry [transbordador] for "Ultramar, Ruta Puerto Juarez Isla Mujeres", and 1 for a trip between Cancun and Ciudad Cuauhtémoc (possibly bus [autobús]) with the name Cornelia Perez.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_with_body: 1 pair of black jeans, "Gardel" brand size 32;  button up shirt fragments; 1 black sock.
case_other_items_with_body: 2 ticket stubs- 1 ferry [transbordador] ticket for "Ultramar  Ruta Puerto Juarez Isla Mujeres", 1 for a trip between Cancun and Ciudad Cuauhtémoc (possibly bus [autobús]); 1 white metal piece with the word "TIGRES" and the letters "U.A.N.L"  Please see images page for photographs of all of these objects.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
